lines.text:
[From opening credits for Series 1]
I'm Herman's intellect. Without me he couldn't hold his job, pay his rent or tie his shoes.
I'm Herman's sensitivity. Without me he wouldn't feel tenderness, honesty or love - the good things in life.
Oh! I'm Herman's anxiety and I keep him out of trouble - and believe me, there's trouble *everywhere*!
I'm Herman's lust. Without me he'd miss out on all the good stuff. Y'know, fun, food - babes!
Jay, there are certain occasions when its better not to think about having sex with someone.
Sure there are. Family reunions.
Herman, I don't sound like Lisa Simpson, do I?
I know what you're thinking. You're thinking "Awww, who's going to go out with the virgin?" Well I'll have you know there are plenty of adult virgins who have active social lives.
Oh yeah - all those Star Trek conventions.
Hey, as long as there are illegal aliens who want citizenship, Jay Nichols will have a date.
Can you believe this party? Never seen so many things I wanna put in my mouth at one time.
Oh, boy. Whenever I meet a girl's father, it's always the same story. First, he offers me money not to see her.
Yeah? Then what happens?
I take the money.
Okay! Time to meet Lita Ford.
Oh, you really think you're gonna walk right up to her and meet her?

Got it all figured out, Herm. I bump into her, introduce myself; she'll fall for me and we'll eventually marry. I'll grow my hair long, get a few tattoos, go to celebrity parties, become an alcoholic... then she'll leave me and it'll end in a bitter divorce.
Okay, so walk right up to her and meet her.
You kidding me? That bitch ruined my life.
Rebecca Woods. She was the most beautiful freshman on campus.
Did ya bag her?
Jay, I don't "bag" women.
I'm sorry. Did ya nail her?
[Herman's apartment has been robbed]
Look at what they did to my apartment! Someone is going to pay for this.
I think it's going to be you, Herm.
Herman, aren't you afraid to be here alone?
No, not any more. Now that I have "Little Herman" here.
[Pulls out a gun]
Is that a real gun?
Yeah!
I can't believe you own a gun!
I can't believe you call it "Little Herman."
I think if we have sex, it'll ruin our friendship.
Why? Are you that bad?
Herman, are you gay?
Are you kidding? Look at how this apartment is decorated.
[speaking of his impotence]
I'm having a little trouble..."hoisting my mainsail."
You have a boat?
[seeing each other nude for the first time]
Wow, Jay, I always knew you had one, but I didn't realize it was so small!
Hey!
Oh, no. I meant your appendectomy scar! That... very nice.
Oh, no.
Oh, yes.
Oh, God.
Oh, well.
